item.title: BMR Calculator
item.description: Quickly calculate your basal metabolic rate (BMR) using the clinically validated Mifflin-St Jeor equation for accurate daily calorie estimation.

item.title: Tools
item.description: All you need to create and share your Javacript or Typescript library with the Open-source community.
